title: Nero v8.3.2.1 Portable by PortableAppz
description:
Nero v8.3.2.1 Portable by PortableAppz

Good to be installed on a PortableApps USB Key.

This is just to respond to a previous upload of a smaller version of the same program added of a nice trojan (not from me, clearly...:o)


This version expands all the needed files in a Dir of your choice and allows you to run:

Nero Burning ROM Portable
Nero Disk Speed Portable
Nero Express Portable
Nero InfoTool Portable.


When you have finished just delete the NeroPortable Dir...


Should have been possible to make a small Menu or batch file to choose which app run, but I&#039;m too lazy today... ;o)


Enjoy and remember to seed... :o)
